Reviews.Title: Not worth buying. You'll laff, you'll cry, you'll kiss $64 goodbye...
Reviews.Author: Michael B. Vederman "dead mike"
Reviews.Content: I am very frustrated with this recorder. The quality is subpar and when recording in manual mode, the files saved were always corrupted. I could not get any long, continuous video out of this recorder and what I could get using motion detection was of extremely (very) low quality. Sadly, there do not seem to be many choices out there for mini DVRs without cameras...

Reviews.Title: Misrepresented Junk
Reviews.Author: Robert  D Haynes
Reviews.Content: I only gave it 1 star to be able to rate it it is misrepresented as HD and able to record audio it can't do either of these its poorly made I'll never by Chinese electronics again and Amazon should know better!

Reviews.Title: very poor made design not a good product
Reviews.Author: jj
Reviews.Content: I received it and it went bad on me right away. I was using it to put into my car for cameras and followed all instruction to a T and I got zebra lines and could find no one to help me. when I bought it felt poorly made pieces sounded like they are inside dangling around nothing seemed tight on it at all.

Reviews.Title: It can do both NTSC or PAL formats!
Reviews.Author: Dale  Gallego
Reviews.Content: Video output by default is in PAL not NTSC. This was not stated in description or specifications when ordered. Since it has limited documentation, customer service stated to me, "the on screen menu can change which output standard to use." Without this knowledge, the blurred PAL video displayed on an NTSC TV made it harder to navigate through the menu to find this setting. But once set, everything worked fine. My recommendation is to supply a manual with the units in future.Thank you BrainyTrade Customer Service SupportSincerely,Dale

Reviews.Title: Defective  horizontal hold
Reviews.Author: JACK R.
Reviews.Content: the picture fluttered continuously. sent it back will try another one same design different item. is that enough words now?

ProductInfo.Features:
Portable motion detection audio video SD Mini recorder DVR system. 2 AV input (video), 1AV output (video).
Ideal for baby monitor, driving record, vehicle monitor record, etc. Supports 2 cameras simultaneously (one recordes video , the other takes pictures).
Connects to TV or monitor through the provided audio and video cable. Features photo taking & video recording functions. Recording mode: motion detection recording, and manual recording. Record overwrite: When you set it on, it will overwrite when the memory is full; otherwise, it will stop recording.
Supports SD memory card (up to 32GB), also supports SDHC memory card (memory card not included). With USB 2.0 port to your PC. With LED indicators.
Package Include: 1 x Mini DVR, 3 x AV Connecting Cable, 1 x USB Cable, 1 x Power Cable, 1 x User Manual
ProductInfo.Name: IMAGE® Mini 2CH 2 Channel SD DVR Video Recorder Surveillance CCTV Motion Max 32G
